net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Class RenderChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.PageElementChain
      • net.proteusframework.cms.controller.RenderChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class RenderChain
extends PageElementChain
    Allows nesting of render calls by page elements / Renderers.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • delegateRender

        public void delegateRender(PageElement pe)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException
        Delegate to a page element that is not in the render chain. Elements not in the chain are ones that are handled dynamically.
        Parameters:
        pe - The page element.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.
        net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ResourceWriterUtil.ResourceAccessException - if a resource cannot be accessed.
        See Also:
        ContentElement.getDelegates()
